comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
@ State Records - surely not "from George Street"?

Wonderfully spooky to be able to date this to the nearest minute - 11:40 am on 4 April 1898.  I bothered to look it up and it was a Monday - almost time for lunch!

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: You are quite right, beachcomberaustralia, it's not George Street at all! I have updated the text to "showing Martin Place." Thanks for pointing that out. Almost time for lunch and just before the lunch rush! There's a post on our Archives Outside blog called Using shadows to date photographs which you might find interesting.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Thanks State Records, that post is really interesting, but I am surprised someone else has not already done it.
